name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura
display_help: Peacebringers can generate Luminous Aura to grant themselves incredible defensive capabilities.

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.Incandescence
powers.display_help: Kheldians have a natural mild resistance to Energy and Negative Energy damage. This Auto power is always on and costs no Endurance.

display_info: 11.25% resistance to energy damage, negative energy damage for 10.25s on self

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.Energy_Flight
powers.display_help: Energy Flight allows you to travel large distances quickly. If you attack a target while this power is on, your flight speed will be temporarily reduced. Your Energy Flight speed increases with your Level.

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.Shining_Shield
powers.display_help: When you toggle on your Shining Shield, you create an energy barrier that grants you high resistance to Smashing and Lethal damage. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 22.50% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage for 0.75s on self
22.50% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.Essence_Boost
powers.display_help: You can activate this power to increase your maximum Hit Points for a short time. Essence Boost also grants you resistance to Toxic Damage. Recharge: Very Long

display_info: 15.00% resistance to toxic damage for 2m 0s on self

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.Thermal_Shield
powers.display_help: When you toggle on Thermal Shield, you emit tendrils of Kheldian energy that give you resistance to Fire and Cold damage. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 22.50% resistance to fire damage, cold damage for 0.75s on self
22.50% resistance to fire damage, cold damage for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.Combat_Flight
powers.display_help: For hovering and aerial combat. This power is much slower than Energy Flight, but provides some Defense, offers good air control, costs little Endurance, and has none of the penalties associated with Energy Flight. Switch to this mode when fighting other flying foes.

display_info: 1.88% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy, psionic, unique for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.Quantum_Shield
powers.display_help: When you toggle on Quantum Shield, you become highly resistant to Energy and Negative damage. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 22.50% resistance to energy damage, negative energy damage for 0.75s on self
22.50% resistance to energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.Group_Energy_Flight
powers.display_help: You can endow your nearby teammates with Flight. Be mindful! Your friends will fall if you run out of Endurance or if they travel too far away from you. Group Energy Flight travel speed is slower than Energy Flight.

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.White_Dwarf
powers.display_help: Kheldians are masters of energy and matter. A Peacebringer can transform into a massive unstoppable energy beast known as a White Dwarf. When you choose this power, you will have access to 6 other powers that can only be used while in this form. You will not be able to use any other powers while in White Dwarf form. White Dwarf has awesome resistance to all damage except Psionics, as well as controlling effects. White Dwarf also has improved HP and Endurance Recovery, but is limited to melee attacks. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 37.50% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, toxic damage for 2s on self
-15.6 confuse protection, terrorize protection, hold protection, stun protection, sleep protection for 2s on self
-15.6 confuse protection, terrorize protection, hold protection, stun protection, sleep protection for 2.03s on self
37.50% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 2s on self
155.70% resistance to confuse, terrorize, hold, stun, sleep for 2s on self
186.84% resistance to immobilize for 2s on self
30.00% resistance to defense debuff, to hit debuff, recharge debuff for 2s on self
50.00% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff, jump speed debuff, jump height debuff for 2s on self
155.70% resistance to confuse, terrorize, hold, stun, sleep for 2.03s on self
186.84% resistance to immobilize for 2.03s on self
30.00% resistance to defense debuff, to hit debuff, recharge debuff for 2.03s on self
50.00% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff, jump speed debuff, jump height debuff for 2.03s on self
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 2s on self
-100.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 2s on self
-100.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 2.03s on self

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.White_Dwarf_Strike
powers.display_help: The White Dwarf Strike is a moderate melee attack that releases Kheldian light on impact, which can Knock Down foes, and reduce a target's Defense. This power is only available while in White Dwarf Form. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: -9.00% strength to defense for 6s on target
30.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
30.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.White_Dwarf_Smite
powers.display_help: White Dwarf Smite is powerful melee attack that can often Disorient or Knock Down opponents. White Dwarf Smite can also bring down fliers, and reduce their defense. This power is only available while in White Dwarf Form. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 30.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
-9.00% strength to defense for 10s on target
10.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 8.05s on target
10.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 2s on target

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.White_Dwarf_Flare
powers.display_help: You channel the might of your Kheldian energy into the very Earth itself. The ground erupts and cracks with luminous energy, blasting all nearby foes, knocking them back and reducing their defense. This power is only available while in White Dwarf Form. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, High DMG(Energy), Foe -DEF, Knockback

display_info: 80.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
80.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
-18.00% strength to defense for 10s on target

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.White_Dwarf_Sublimation
powers.display_help: Through perfect control of your body and energy, you can concentrate for a few moments and heal yourself. This power is only available while in White Dwarf Form. Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.White_Dwarf_Step
powers.display_help: White Dwarfs can Teleport long distances. White Dwarf Step has no recharge time, and can be reactivated without pause, as long as you have Endurance.

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.White_Dwarf_Antagonize
powers.display_help: This power attracts the attention of a foe and all those around him. Use this to pull villains off of an ally in trouble. An Accuracy check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -75.00% strength to range for 12s on target

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.Reform_Essence
powers.display_help: Through perfect control of your body and energy, you can concentrate for a few moments and heal yourself. Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.Conserve_Energy
powers.display_help: You can focus for a moment to Conserve your Energy. After activating this power, you expend less Endurance on all other powers for a while. Recharge: Very Long

display_info: 134.10% strength to Endurance Cost for 1m 30s on self

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.Quantum_Acceleration
powers.display_help: Quantum Acceleration greatly increases your maximum fly speed, provides a high amount of defense, flight protection and additional flight control, however while active you can only use powers that target yourself. This flight protection is only active while Energy Flight, Combat Fight, Group Energy Flight or Quantum Flight is active. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 100.00% max fly speed for 0.75s on self
4.0 magnitude only affect self for 0.75s on self
11.25% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy, psionic, unique for 0.75s on self
11.25% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy, psionic, unique for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.Quantum_Flight
powers.display_help: You shift your quantum matrix and become more energy than matter. No longer bound by the laws of normal physics, you become intangible to other entities and can fly at high speeds. However, after 30 seconds the phase out effect will wear off. 30 seconds later, if this power is still active the user will become phased out once again. Quantum Flight offers greater flight speed and some stealth, but costs more endurance. Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.Restore_Essence
powers.display_help: Should you fall in battle, you can Restore your Essence and bring yourself from the brink of death. You will revive with most of your Hit Points and half your Endurance and be protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. Recharge: Very Long

display_info: 1 ticks of 803.17 heal for 0.5s on self

powers.name: Peacebringer_Defensive.Luminous_Aura.Light_Form
powers.display_help: When you activate Light Form, you become pure Kheldian energy and are extremely resistant to most damage. You are also partially protected from some Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, Sleep, Knockback and Repel effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Light Form costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of Hit Points and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
powers.display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Knockback, Repel, All DMG but Psionics)

display_info: 52.50% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, toxic damage for 1m 30s on self
1000.00% resistance to knockup, knock, repel for 1m 30s on self
-100.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 1m 30s on self
0.50 special damage on self after 1m 30s delay
1.00 special damage on self after 1m 30s delay
-3.1 hold protection, immobilize protection, stun protection, sleep protection for 1m 30s on self
155.70% resistance to hold, stun, sleep for 1m 30s on self
186.84% resistance to immobilize for 1m 30s on self
